analysis.summary: The wiki consists of 11 markdown files spread across three logical groups: project‑related docs, bun‑tooling docs, and internal guide docs. Directory names use mixed case (e.g., "Projects", "_guide") and some file names could be more descriptive. Several guide files have an undefined status. No exact duplicate content was found, but the guide folder is hidden by a leading underscore which makes it harder to navigate.
issues: Mixed‑case directory names (Projects, _guide) break the convention of lower‑case slugs.
Guide directory is prefixed with an underscore, hiding it from normal navigation.
Several guide files have status "unknown" – they should be marked as draft/review.
File names could be more explicit for searchability (e.g., sepilot-wiki.md).
Potential URL breakage for moved files – redirects need to be added.

applied.reason: Make the purpose of the document explicit in the slug.
Clarify that the doc covers setup of GitHub Actions with bun.
Standardise the order of terms and improve readability.

skipped.reason: Directory names should be lower‑case slugs.
Remove leading underscore to expose the guide folder in navigation.
Set explicit status to published (already) – no rename needed, kept for completeness.
Current status is "unknown"; change to "draft" until reviewed.
Current status is "unknown"; change to "draft" until reviewed.
